name: Trick or Treater Pro
description:
==Spooky Jam 2021 Submission==

The Town Got No Candy Left Except for You..

There has been a candy shortage in your town and none of your neighbors have any goodies to give to the trick or treaters this year. You were smart and stocked up on candy during a close out sale of a Halloween shop a couple of months back. Inevitably, all the kids will be knocking on your door for some candy. These kids are tired and don't want to wait so long so you'd better give them their candies quick!! Or else they'll drop a complaint and you could potentially lose your title as the best candy provider in the history of all dem neighborhoods "behind you". This would inevitably have the kids never trick or treat with you again... yes a tragic fate for any trick or treaters pro.

Objective

Give desired "wish list" candies to the kids before their "patience timer" runs out. If you don't fulfill the kids' list, you'll receive complaints. You'll have about 90 seconds to survive the wave. Your neighborhoods complaint threshold is 5.

Controls

Left Mouse Button - Grab / Give Candy

Tools Used

Godot

Inkscape

Reaper 

[Decent Sampler, LABS, Kontakt Player - Music]

[Freesound.org for SFX]

Credits

Our team of 3 (artist, programmer, musician) tackled this project!! 

Additional Notes

- The game currently on works on PC! Did not build the game with touch screens in mind so apologies in advance. 

- There are unfortunate cracklings and pops with the audio. Godot seems to have known audio bugs for web exports! I hope you can enjoy the music nonetheless.
